pageInfo.overallVibe: Confident, modern, gradient-rich with dynamic animations
pageInfo.primaryPurpose: Showcase payment platform capabilities and drive signups

usage.backgrounds: Deep navy (#0A2540) for hero, white and very light gray (#F6F9FC) for sections, gradient overlays
usage.text: Dark navy (#0A2540) on light, white on dark, mid-gray (#697386) for secondary
usage.buttons: Purple (#635BFF) primary, white outline for secondary, gradient variants for special CTAs

colorSystem.colorTheory: Professional dark navy as foundation with vibrant purple and cyan gradients for energy and innovation. High contrast for clarity.

typography.hierarchy: Strong hierarchy through size and weight. Headlines use tight letter-spacing for modern feel. Body text prioritizes readability with generous line-height.

spacing.sectionPadding: 96px vertical on desktop, 64px on tablet, 48px on mobile
spacing.componentSpacing: 40px between major components, 24px between related elements

grid.maxWidth: 1280px with 80px side padding on large screens

sections.name: Hero Section
sections.structure: Full-width with centered content, animated gradient background
sections.height: Auto with generous padding (160px top, 120px bottom)

sections.name: Feature Grid
sections.structure: 3-column grid on desktop, 2-col on tablet, 1-col on mobile

sections.name: Product Showcase
sections.structure: Alternating image-text layout (image left, then right)

layout.patterns: Heavy use of asymmetric layouts, gradient panels, floating UI elements for visual interest

cards.hoverEffect: transform translateY(-2px), shadow increases, transition 200ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)

navigation.style: White background with subtle bottom border, backdrop-blur when scrolled
navigation.activeState: Purple underline (3px thick) for active link

gradients.name: Mesh gradient background
gradients.value: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(99, 91, 255, 0.08) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.08) 0%, transparent 50%)

keyframes.name: fadeInUp
keyframes.description: Elements fade in while moving up 20px

keyframes.name: float
keyframes.description: UI elements gently float up and down

microInteractions: Buttons lift 2px on hover with shadow increase
Cards translate up 2px and shadow intensifies on hover
Links show animated arrow → that shifts right on hover
Inputs show focus ring that fades in smoothly
Navigation items underline slides in from left on hover
scrollAnimations: Sections fade in and translate up as they enter viewport
Product images slide in from alternating sides

designPatterns.visualStyle: Modern, gradient-enhanced flat design with strategic depth through shadows
keyCharacteristics: Vibrant purple and cyan gradients as signature colors
Strong typography hierarchy with tight letter-spacing
Subtle animations that add polish without distraction
Floating UI elements and asymmetric layouts for visual interest
Heavy use of shadows for depth and layering
uniqueElements: Animated gradient backgrounds that subtly shift
Floating product UI mockups with subtle animation
Interactive code examples with syntax highlighting

essentialElements: Custom gradient generator for background effects
Framer Motion or similar for micro-interactions
Icon library matching Stripe's style (custom or Phosphor icons)

techStack.recommended: React/Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, TypeScript

breakpoints.mobile: Single column, reduced padding, smaller type scale
breakpoints.tablet: 2-column grids, medium padding, adjusted type scale
breakpoints.desktop: Full layout, maximum spacing, full type scale

adaptations: Feature grids collapse from 3-col to 2-col to 1-col
Navigation becomes hamburger menu on mobile
Floating UI elements simplified or removed on mobile

accessibilityFeatures.contrast: All text meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for body, 3:1 for large text)
accessibilityFeatures.focusStates: Visible focus indicators on all interactive elements
accessibilityFeatures.semantics: Proper heading hierarchy, ARIA labels where needed
